name: Rocket, Enlarge! (Hamza Yuşa Delipoyraz)
description:
This is a game made in two days, in Bahcesehir Uni. Fall Jam 2021.

The concept was "It's bigger on the inside" so we made a rocket which is getting bigger after it went down into a hole. 

Credits:

Hamza Yuşa Delipoyraz - Game & Level Design

Okan Ataç - Programming & Game Design
